SHS Bihar Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 220 Ophthalmic Assistant Posts
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Aug 08, 2025, 16:11 IST
 National Health Mission
 220 Jobs |  Posted On : 08-Aug-2025 |  Bihar |  Salary : 15,000 to 15,000




FOLLOW

The State Health Society (SHS), Bihar, has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 220 Ophthalmic Assistant Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the 12th, Diploma can grab this chance and apply for these posts. Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for the SHS Bihar Recruitment 2025. Interested and eligible candidates can apply on or before the last date of application. For more details, visit the official website.




If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government Jobs in 2025 that you can all apply for. Use this link for more jobs in Bihar.

SHS Bihar Recruitment 2025 - Eligibility Criteria
Name of the Posts	No.of Vacacnies	Qualification
Ophthalmic Assistant 	220	12th, Diploma

Age Limit for the SHS Bihar Recruitment 2025 

The Minimum Age Limit: 21 years.
The Maximum Age Limit: 37 years.

Age Relaxation

BC, OBC, EWS/ UR (Female) Candidates: 3 Years
SC, ST Candidates: 5 Years
PWD Candidates: 10 Years

Selection Process for the SHS Bihar Recruitment 2025

Written Test
Interview

Salary Structure for the SHS Bihar Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Salary: Rs. 15,000 /- per month.

Application fee for the SHS Bihar Recruitment 2025

PWBD/ Female/ SC/ ST of Bihar Candidates: Rs. 125/-
UR/ EWS/ BC/ EBC Candidates: Rs. 500/-
How to Apply for the SHS Bihar Recruitment 2025
Visit the official website.
Go to the recruitment or career page.
Check for the Ophthalmic Assistant Jobs 2025.
Read the notification carefully.
Check the eligibility criteria.
If you meet the eligibility criteria.
Click on the Apply Online link.
Register with your email and password.
Download the application form.
Fill out the application form without any mistakes.
Submit the application form and capture the application number for further use.

Important Dates

Starting Date of Application	14-08-2025
Last Date of Application	28-08-2025

 

Apply Online	Click Here
Official Notification	Click Here
Join Whatsapp Group	Join Now
Join on Telegram	Join Now
